text: Malpertuis is a 1971 Belgian French German fantasy horror movie directed by Harry Kümel and is based on the novel of the same name. It stars Orson Welles, Susan Hampshire, Michel Bouquet, Mathieu Carrière, Jean-Pierre Cassel, Daniel Pilon. == Other websites == * * * * Category:1971 fantasy movies Category:1971 horror movies Category:Belgian fantasy movies Category:Belgian horror movies Category:French fantasy movies Category:French horror movies Category:German fantasy movies Category:German horror movies Category:Movies based on books
title: Malpertuis (movie)
